oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wartime carte de visite of Literary Building on University of Nashville campus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wartime CDV of the Literary Building at the University of Nashville with inscription above: "Hospital where dad was sick during civil war." As a Federal hospital attached to Hospital No. 2, it had 300 beds. Recuperating Union troops were quartered in and outside the building see tents at right. Photo belonged to Fletcher Kennard, who was in an Ohio regiment posted to Nashville where he was hospitalized on the University of Nashville campus.
